FriendyControl: Models and Views¶

Views¶

friendycontrol.views.add_composition(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Creates a CompositionList by selecting the FriendListGroupName that will form this CompositionList object.

Template: friendycontrol/composition_form.html

Context:

form_composition: a select multiple box

form_readable: a checkbox to mark whether you give
or deny the readable permission

form_app: the application to which you give readable access

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.add_friend(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This function creates a new friendycontrol.FriendPerson object. If everything was right, after submiting the content you must be redirected to a page where the friendlist is shown.

Template: friendycontrol/friend_form.html

Context:

form: The form object to render.

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation.

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.add_friendlist(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Creates a friendlist that will be elegible for the CompositionList.

Template: friendycontrol/friendlist_form.html

Context:

form: The form object to render

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.delete_composition(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Deletes the CompositionList and all his dependencies

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.delete_friend(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Use this function if you want to delete a friend list. It takes an id argument, which is the friend id

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.delete_friendlist(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a friendlist.

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.edit_composition(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Edits the CompositionList by changing the elements that belongs to it.

Template: friendycontrol/composition_form.html

Context:

form_composition: a select multiple box

form_readable: a checkbox to mark whether you give
or deny the readable permission

form_app: the application to which you give readable access

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.edit_friend(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Use this function if you want to edit a friend list. It takes an id argument, which is the friend id

Template: friendycontrol/friend_form.html

Context:

form: The form object to render

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.edit_friendlist(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Edit a friendlist.

Template: friendycontrol/friendlist_form.html

Context:

form: The form object to render

add: True if you want to re-mark that is an add operation

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.show_main_compositions(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Shows a list of composition objects

Template: friendycontrol/compositions_content.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.show_main_friends(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Shows a list of friends objects

Template: friendycontrol/friends_content.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
friendycontrol.views.show_main_friendylist(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This function returns a list with the friend list belonging to the user.

Template: friendycontrol/friendlist_content.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()

Models¶

class friendycontrol.models.CompositionList(*args, **kwargs)¶

CompositionList allows the user the composition of a list of friends, joining different FriendLists

Arguments:
  • id: AutoField
  • composition_list: ManyToManyField(FriendListGroupName)
  • owner = User
class friendycontrol.models.FriendListGroupName(*args, **kwargs)¶

This is the list of friends (FriendList).

Arguments:
  • id: AutoField
  • group_name: CharField
  • slug: SlugField
  • owner: User
  • description: TextField
class friendycontrol.models.FriendPerson(*args, **kwargs)¶

FriendPerson, object that joins friend Users inside the FriendListGroupName.

Arguments:
  • id: AutoField
  • friend: User
  • friend_of: User
  • group_list: ManyToManyField(FriendListGroupName)
class friendycontrol.models.Readable(*args, **kwargs)¶

Readable is an object that will point to the FriendListGroupName object. Readable is the object that will grant read permissions to the users that are related with the FriendListGroupName object.

Arguments:
  • id: AutoField
  • read: BooleanField, default= False
  • foreign_group: CompositionList
class friendycontrol.models.RelationModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

RelationalModel is a model that joins objects from any model with a Readable object.

Arguments:
  • id: AutoField
  • readable: Readable
  • content_type: ContentType
  • content_object: GenericForeignKey()
content_object¶

Provides a generic relation to any object through content-type/object-id fields.
